title: Ancient African bedrock reveals violent beginnings of life on our blue planet
description: Geologist explores Earth’s oldest rocks in the Makhonjwa Mountains to show how early oceans, volcanic activity and primitive life shaped our planet’s blue beginnings.

title: 'Ancient' event celebrating contribution of farmers being held next weekend
description: A Plough Sunday service will be held at Ripon Cathedral on January 11 to celebrate the contribution of farmers.

title: Archaeologists uncover rare stones and coins at Taxila’s ancient Bhir Mound
description: The discoveries were made at the ancient Bhir Mound, where experts unearthed decorative stones dating to the 6th century BC and coins from the 2nd century AD.Dawn reported that officials hailed the discovery as the most significant at the site in a decade.
